title: Desk Jockey

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Receive the names of the players that visited you on night of use.
- Learn the roles that visited you on night of use.
- Learn the effects of the actions that were performed on you of night of use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Redirect immunity and control immunity
- Each ability can be used twice

desc:
Post 3526
*One day, I'll finally have SOMETHING to do!*
